answers.answer: A neurologic disease continues to be a leading possibility.Studies like a nerve conduction study, MRI, and blood tests to exclude B12 deficiency, diabetes, or thyroid disorder should all be considered.If negative, restless legs syndrome can be entertained.I suggest a referral to a neurologist (not neurosurgeon) for further evaluation.This answer is not intended as and does not substitute for medical advice - the information presented is for patients education only. Please see your personal physician for further evaluation of your individual case.Kevin, M.D.www.kevinmd.com
